title: An interesting predicament regarding my welcome email
body: I  haven't been locked out of my account, but I know that if someone were to hack my account, I'd need my original welcome email for proof of ownership...thing is, I started playing this game during the beta back in late 2009. Yahoo seems to have deleted all of my old emails prior to 2010. So Riot, what do I need to do so that if this does happen, I can prove ownership over my account?

replies.body:
Our account team may ask a series of different questions to help verify ownership, so having a screenshot (which isn't usually asked) or remembering your sign up address isn't absolutely crucial.  It can help, but not a deal breaker!  That said, thanks for playing for so long!  <3

We can look into your icon request!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can try and verify it.  It's been a long time, but we'll do our best!
Also, totally off topic, but I realized that I never received my beta test summoner icon! Do these still exist? It's been a loooong time since I've last played league.
